[File: consensus/src/consensus_observer/observer/subscription_manager.rs] [Function: spawn_subscription_creation_task()] [Lock holding] Does cloning all state (active_observer_subscriptions, clients, etc.) before spawning avoid holding locks during async operations, or can long-running tasks cause deadlocks? [File: consensus/src/consensus_observer/observer/subscription_manager.rs] [Function: spawn_subscription_creation_task()] [Async task ordering] Can new subscriptions be added to active_observer_subscriptions before they are fully initialized, causing race conditions in concurrent health checks? [File: consensus/src/consensus_observer/observer/subscription_manager.rs] [Function: spawn_subscription_creation_task()] [Terminated peer resubscription] Can the terminated_subscription_peers list be manipulated to force resubscription to malicious peers that were just terminated for bad behavior? [File: consensus/src/consensus_observer/observer/subscription_manager.rs] [Function: spawn_subscription_creation_task()] [Warning suppression] Does the warning log for failed subscription creation get rate-limited, or can it be spammed to hide more critical issues in logs? (Low)

[File: consensus/src/consensus_observer/observer/subscription_manager.rs] [Function: spawn_subscription_creation_task()] [Metrics race] Can update_subscription_change_metrics() be called concurrently with other metric updates, causing inconsistent or corrupt metrics data? (Low)

[File: consensus/src/consensus_observer/observer/subscription_manager.rs] [Function: terminate_all_subscriptions()] [Race with creation] Can terminate_all_subscriptions() race with spawn_subscription_creation_task(), where new subscriptions are added while termination is in progress? (High)

[File: consensus/src/consensus_observer/observer/subscription_manager.rs] [Function: terminate_all_subscriptions()] [Resource leak] Are all async unsubscribe tasks properly awaited or do they become orphaned, potentially leaking network connections or memory? (Medium)

[File: consensus/src/consensus_observer/observer/subscription_manager.rs] [Function: terminate_all_subscriptions()] [Lock duration] Does iterating over all subscriptions while holding the lock cause prolonged lock holding, enabling DoS through lock contention? (Medium)

[File: consensus/src/consensus_observer/observer/subscription_manager.rs] [Function: terminate_unhealthy_subscriptions()] [Error accumulation] Can accumulated errors in terminated_subscriptions grow unbounded, causing memory issues if subscriptions are frequently churning? (Low)
